config-param.name: postprocessorJS
entitymetadata
config-param.value:
{"dml":false,"query":"SELECT
 ao.object_id,
 f.lot_no AS ID,
 oi.thumbnail_url,
 oi.content_type,
 COUNT(DISTINCT ab.bid_by) AS bids,
 a.bid_close_date AS time_remaining,
 f.milage,
 mcd.value AS year,
 msa_cat.cat_name AS category_name,
 msa_sub_cat.cat_name AS sub_category_name,
 COALESCE(MAX(ab.bid_amount), f.target_selling_price) AS max_bid_amount,
 NULLIF(mb.highest_bidder, '') AS highest_bidder,
 a.auction_id
FROM auctions a
LEFT JOIN asset_objects ao ON a.object_id = ao.object_id
LEFT JOIN fleet f ON f.object_id = ao.object_id
LEFT JOIN auction_bidding ab ON ab.object_id = ao.object_id
LEFT JOIN master_category_details mcd ON mcd.cat_detail_id = f.year_of_making
LEFT JOIN master_asset_categories msa_cat ON msa_cat.cat_id = f.category_id
LEFT JOIN master_asset_categories msa_sub_cat ON msa_sub_cat.cat_id = f.sub_category_id
OUTER APPLY (
 SELECT TOP 1 ai.file_url AS thumbnail_url,ai.content_type
 FROM object_images ai
 WHERE ai.object_id = ao.object_id AND ai.thumbnail_image = 1
 ORDER BY ai.object_id 
) oi
OUTER APPLY (
 SELECT TOP 1 WITH TIES ab.bid_by AS highest_bidder
 FROM auction_bidding ab
 WHERE ab.object_id = ao.object_id
 ORDER BY ab.bid_amount DESC
) mb
WHERE a.auction_id is not null and f.wf_activity_id = 'FLA'
GROUP BY ao.object_id, f.lot_no, oi.thumbnail_url, a.bid_close_date,
 f.milage, mcd.value, msa_cat.cat_name, msa_sub_cat.cat_name, mb.highest_bidder, f.target_selling_price,a.auction_id,oi.content_type;","overloadPosition":0,"serviceInput":[],"serviceOutput":[{"type":"STRING","name":"category_name","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"name":"records","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"year","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"auction_id","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"thumbnail_url","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"object_id","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"time_remaining","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"max_bid_amount","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"content_type","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"highest_bidder","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"milage","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"name":"auction_list","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"bids","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"sub_category_name","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"},{"type":"STRING","name":"ID","inoutType":0,"sqlDataType":0,"ordinalPosition":0,"paramClass":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.ParamTypeData"}],"name":"CustomQuery","schemaName":"dbo","serviceType":"com.kony.rdbms.metadata.model.CustomQueryMetadata"}

config-param.name: customQuery
config-param.value: SELECT ao.object_id, f.lot_no AS ID, oi.thumbnail_url, oi.content_type, COUNT(DISTINCT ab.bid_by) AS bids, a.bid_close_date AS time_remaining, f.milage, mcd.value AS year, msa_cat.cat_name AS category_name, msa_sub_cat.cat_name AS sub_category_name, COALESCE(MAX(ab.bid_amount), f.target_selling_price) AS max_bid_amount, NULLIF(mb.highest_bidder, '') AS highest_bidder, a.auction_id FROM auctions a LEFT JOIN asset_objects ao ON a.object_id = ao.object_id LEFT JOIN fleet f ON f.object_id = ao.object_id LEFT JOIN auction_bidding ab ON ab.object_id = ao.object_id LEFT JOIN master_category_details mcd ON mcd.cat_detail_id = f.year_of_making LEFT JOIN master_asset_categories msa_cat ON msa_cat.cat_id = f.category_id LEFT JOIN master_asset_categories msa_sub_cat ON msa_sub_cat.cat_id = f.sub_category_id OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 ai.file_url AS thumbnail_url,ai.content_type FROM object_images ai WHERE ai.object_id = ao.object_id AND ai.thumbnail_image = 1 ORDER BY ai.object_id ) oi OUTER APPLY ( SELECT TOP 1 WITH TIES ab.bid_by AS highest_bidder FROM auction_bidding ab WHERE ab.object_id = ao.object_id ORDER BY ab.bid_amount DESC ) mb WHERE a.auction_id is not null and f.wf_activity_id = 'FLA' GROUP BY ao.object_id, f.lot_no, oi.thumbnail_url, a.bid_close_date, f.milage, mcd.value, msa_cat.cat_name, msa_sub_cat.cat_name, mb.highest_bidder, f.target_selling_price,a.auction_id,oi.content_type;
